name: 2022 11th International Conference on Frontiers of Information Technology
content: For papers submitted to ICFIT 2022, we offer the publications as following: Accepted papers after undergoing a preliminary review and rigorous peer review will be published in the conference proceedings by IEEE Conference Publishing Services (CPS), which could be included into IEEE Xplore and submitted for indexing by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc. A few selected papers of extended version will be published in the Journal of Advances in Information Technology , which will be indexed by Scopus, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CrossRef, CNKI, etc.
